name: Run To Survive (Yunus_6523)
description:
Due to some issues with the Unity engine the Game is not nearly as finished and Polished as I wanted it to be, but still somewhat enjoyable

When a zombie apocalypse starts and they come for you, no weapons, how do you defend yourself? Simple: YOU RUN!

In this  Game you play as Jack Murray alongside him is his best friend Josh Burns. You run from Zombies, the dangerous Scavengers leader  Karla and is that... a zombie... Gorilla?

You move with the A and D keys and jump with the Spacebar

On the Controller you play with the left stick and jump with the south controller button.

Sound effects were provided by WeLoveIndies

The currently only song were provided by EpidemicSounds by the following artists:

Winds Carry Me Through by Off Cuts
